Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports AMR-NB, MIDI, 3GPP, WAV, MP3, AAC
Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Dual Speakers, Dolby Digital Sound Technology
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports H.263, H.264, MPEG-4, Full HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Exmor R Sensor, Dual Flash Support, Auto Focus, Scene Detection and Tuning, High Dynamic Range (HDR), Low Light Enhancement, Face Recognition (For Focussing as well as in Gallery), Vertical and Horizontal Panorama Capture, Geo-tagging, Smart Camera Features

Other Features.Additional Features: Micro USB 5-pin, Customized Video Player, USB OTG Support, Dual Float Window, Smart Awake, Voice Controls, Free Themes, Lock Screens, Unibody Metallic Design, Voice Input
Other Features.Sensors: Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: IPS Display, Damage Resistant Corning Gorilla Glass 3, Gamut of Touch Free Gesture Features, Hover Support, Cold Screen Access, Gesture Control, 5 Fingers Supported, Smart Gesture Features

Platform.OS: Android v4.2 (Jelly Bean), Upgradable to v4.4 (KitKat)
